## ğŸ§  Semantics for PR Title & Branch Name

Please ensure your PR title and branch name follow the Keploy semantics:

ğŸ“Œ [PR Semantics Guide](https://github.com/keploy/keploy/wiki/PR-Semantics)  
ğŸ“Œ [Branch Semantics Guide](https://github.com/keploy/keploy/wiki/Branch-Semantics)

**Examples:**

- **PR Title**: `fix: patch MongoDB document update bug`  
- **Branch Name**: `feat/#1-login-flow` (You may skip mentioning the issue number in the branch name if the change is small and the PR description clearly explains it.)

- [ ] Have you followed the [Branch Semantics guide](https://github.com/keploy/keploy/wiki/Branch-Semantics) for naming your branch?
